prompts: Create a spooky ghost-type Pokemon with a pumpkin theme and flowing ghostly limbs.
I want a Halloween-inspired Pokemon that has a scary smile and is made of dark materials.
Generate a unique ghost-type creature that resembles a haunted pumpkin with a playful demeanor.
Make a fantasy Pokemon that combines ghostly elements with a pumpkin shape and swirling patterns.
Imagine a ghostly Pokemon that plays tricks on trainers, featuring a pumpkin body and mischievous grin.
Design a Pokemon that embodies fall, with vibrant colors and a spirit-like appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that has a mix of spooky and playful features, perfect for Halloween.
